JointGear - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint
Gear Joint, is used to connect two joints together.
JointGear(World, Body, Body, RevoluteJoint, PrismaticJoint, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint.JointGear
Creates a gear joint, you specify a gear ratio to bind the motions together: coordinate1 + ratio * coordinate2 = constant The ratio can be negative or positive.
JointGear(World, PhysicsBody2D, PhysicsBody2D, JointRevolute, JointPrismatic, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint.JointGear
